ygData.subject: Re: Bows
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Gaeleyen, I try to carry both if i can, depending on weather I m looting or not. I find that I just never know what the situation is going to be as
ygData.messageBody:
Hi Gaeleyen,<br><br>I try to carry both if i can,
depending on weather I'm looting or not. I find that I just
never know what the situation is going to be as I'm on
at different hours each time I play.<br><br>Actually
as a ranger I sort of feel like i should be prepared
for almost anything. If I'm just going out for exp. I
carry a twohanded, a onehanded and shield, big bow,
small bow, lots of arrows, and food/water. This keeps
me just below full weight, and I usually try to get
some big oaf to carry my food and water for
me.<br><br>It's incredible isn't it how much setting up one has
to do in order to prepare, and all you really want
to do is slay, slay, slay.<br><br>Can anyone tell me
of a good area to get from 15-20 without too much
difficulty? And please don't suggest Black Burrough, that
place is murder/suicide!<br><br>Happy hunting )'<br>Rik
(a.k.a. Turael of the Seventh Hammer server)
